Question: What are the last names and email addresses of users assigned to tasks which are part of the project with projectId 'P-123'?
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)<-[assignedTo:ASSIGNED_TO]-(task:Task)-[includedIn:INCLUDES_TASK]->(project:Project {projectId:"P-123"})
RETURN user, assignedTo, task, includedIn, project, user.lastName, user.email
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)<-[assignedTo:ASSIGNED_TO]-(task:Task)-[includedIn:INCLUDES_TASK]-(project:Project {projectId:"P-123"})
RETURN user, assignedTo, task, includedIn, project, user.lastName, user.email
Rewrite: What are the surnames and email contacts for users allocated to tasks within the project having projectId 'P-123'?

Question: List all the project names and descriptions where the user with userId 'U-009' is a member and also assigned to tasks that depend on other tasks with 'High' priority.
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User {userId:"U-009"})-[:PART_OF]->(project:Project)-[:INCLUDES_TASK]->(task:Task)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(dependentTask:Task {priority:"High"})
WHERE (task)-[:ASSIGNED_TO]->(user)
RETURN user, project, task, dependentTask, project.name, project.description
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (user:User {userId:"U-009"})-[relation4:PART_OF]->(project:Project)-[relation5:INCLUDES_TASK]->(task:Task)-[relation6:DEPENDS_ON]->(dependentTask:Task {priority:"High"})
WHERE (task)-[relation7:ASSIGNED_TO]->(user)
RETURN relation7, relation6, relation5, relation4, user, project, task, dependentTask, project.name, project.description

Question: Retrieve the task names and estimated hours for tasks that are due on '2023-12-01' and are part of projects that Team 'DevOps' is working on.
Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {name:"DevOps"})-[worksOn:TEAM_WORKS_ON]->(project:Project)-[includes:INCLUDES_TASK]->(task:Task {dueDate: date("2023-12-01")})
RETURN team, worksOn, project, includes, task, task.name, task.estimatedHours
Rewrite: Fetch the names and estimated hours of tasks due on '2023-12-01' associated with projects handled by Team 'DevOps'.

Question: For the user 'John Doe', identify all the milestone titles and deadlines for milestones related to the tasks he is assigned to.
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[assignedTo:ASSIGNED_TO]->(task:Task)-[milestoneFor:MILESTONE_FOR]->(milestone:Milestone)
WHERE user.firstName="John" AND user.lastName="Doe"
RETURN user, assignedTo, task, milestoneFor, milestone, milestone.title, milestone.deadline
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[assignedTo:ASSIGNED_TO]-(task:Task)-[milestoneFor:MILESTONE_FOR]-(milestone:Milestone)
WHERE user.firstName="John" AND user.lastName="Doe"
RETURN user, assignedTo, task, milestoneFor, milestone, milestone.title, milestone.deadline
Rewrite: Retrieve all the titles and deadlines of milestones associated with the tasks assigned to the user 'John Doe'.

Question: Can you provide the descriptions and due dates of tasks which are dependent on the task 'Task101' managed by user 'Jane Smith'?
Cypher:
MATCH (dependentTask:Task)-[dependency:DEPENDS_ON]->(mainTask:Task)<-[:ASSIGNED_TO]-(manager:User)
WHERE mainTask.taskId = 'Task101' AND manager.firstName = 'Jane' AND manager.lastName = 'Smith'
RETURN dependentTask, dependency, mainTask, manager, dependentTask.description, dependentTask.dueDate
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (dependentTask:Task)-[dependency:DEPENDS_ON]->(mainTask:Task)-[relation4:ASSIGNED_TO]-(manager:User)
WHERE mainTask.taskId = 'Task101' AND manager.firstName = 'Jane' AND manager.lastName = 'Smith'
RETURN relation4, dependentTask, dependency, mainTask, manager, dependentTask.description, dependentTask.dueDate
Rewrite: Could you supply the details and deadlines for the tasks that rely on 'Task101', overseen by 'Jane Smith'?

Question: Display the names and statuses of projects that include milestones with a deadline before '2023-07-30' and are being led by a user from the 'Management' team.
Cypher:
MATCH (managementTeam:Team {name:"Management"})-[:MEMBER_OF]-(manager:User)-[manages:MANAGES]->(project:Project)-[includesMilestone:INCLUDES_MILESTONE]->(milestone:Milestone)
WHERE milestone.deadline < DATE('2023-07-30')
RETURN managementTeam, manager, manages, project, includesMilestone, milestone, project.name, project.status
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (managementTeam:Team {name:"Management"})-[relation4:MEMBER_OF]-(manager:User)-[manages:MANAGES]->(project:Project)-[includesMilestone:INCLUDES_MILESTONE]->(milestone:Milestone)
WHERE milestone.deadline < DATE('2023-07-30')
RETURN relation4, managementTeam, manager, manages, project, includesMilestone, milestone, project.name, project.status
Rewrite: Show the names and statuses of projects containing milestones due before '2023-07-30', which are overseen by a user on the 'Management' team.

Question: When did user 'U-776' join the team assigned to the project 'ProjectX'?
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User {userId:"U-776"})-[memberOf:MEMBER_OF]->(team:Team)-[worksOn:TEAM_WORKS_ON]->(project:Project {name:"ProjectX"})
RETURN user, memberOf, team, worksOn, project, memberOf.joinedDate
Rewrite: When was user 'U-776' added to the team working on 'ProjectX'?

Question: What are the start dates of teams working on the projects where task 'TaskX' is included, and the specific task has a 'Critical' status?
Cypher:
MATCH (criticalTask:Task {status:"Critical", name:"TaskX"})<-[included:INCLUDES_TASK]-(project:Project)<-[worksOn:TEAM_WORKS_ON]-(team:Team)
RETURN criticalTask, included, project, worksOn, team, worksOn.startDate
Rewrite: What are the commencement dates for teams involved in projects that include 'TaskX', where the task in question is marked as 'Critical'?

Question: What are the assigned dates of users to the tasks that are milestones for the 'Yearly Review' project that concluded on '2023-05-15'?
Cypher:
MATCH (project:Project {name: "Yearly Review", endDate: date("2023-05-15")})-[:INCLUDES_MILESTONE]->(milestone:Milestone)-[:MILESTONE_FOR]->(task:Task)<-[assignedTo:ASSIGNED_TO]-(user:User)
RETURN project, milestone, task, user, assignedTo, assignedTo.assignedDate
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (project:Project {name: "Yearly Review", endDate: date("2023-05-15")})-[relation4:INCLUDES_MILESTONE]-(milestone:Milestone)-[relation5:MILESTONE_FOR]->(task:Task)-[assignedTo:ASSIGNED_TO]-(user:User)
RETURN relation5, relation4, project, milestone, task, user, assignedTo, assignedTo.assignedDate
Rewrite: What are the dates allocated to users for milestone tasks in the 'Yearly Review' project, which concluded on '2023-05-15'?

Question: How many users were assigned to tasks by 'Manager M' in the project 'Expansion2023' and what was the latest assigned date among them?
Cypher:
MATCH (manager:User)-[:MANAGES]->(project:Project)-[:INCLUDES_TASK]->(task:Task)-[assigned:ASSIGNED_TO]->(user:User)
WHERE manager.firstName="Manager" AND manager.lastName="M" AND project.name="Expansion2023"
RETURN manager, project, task, assigned, user, COUNT(user) as count, MAX(assigned.assignedDate) as latestAssignedDate
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (manager:User)-[relation4:MANAGES]->(project:Project)-[relation5:INCLUDES_TASK]->(task:Task)-[assigned:ASSIGNED_TO]->(user:User)
WHERE manager.firstName="Manager" AND manager.lastName="M" AND project.name="Expansion2023"
RETURN relation5, relation4, manager, project, task, assigned, user, COUNT(user) as count, MAX(assigned.assignedDate) as latestAssignedDate
Rewrite: How many users did 'Manager M' assign to tasks in the 'Expansion2023' project, and what is the most recent assignment date among those?

Question: What is the earliest date that a task was reported as 'Completed' under milestone 'Milestone 5' of project 'P-500'?
Cypher:
MATCH (proj:Project {projectId:"P-500"})-[includesMilestone:INCLUDES_MILESTONE]->(milestone:Milestone {title:"Milestone 5"})
MATCH (milestone)-[milestoneFor:MILESTONE_FOR]->(task:Task)
MATCH (task)-[reportStatus:REPORTS_STATUS {status:"Completed"}]->(milestone)
RETURN proj, includesMilestone, milestone, milestoneFor, task, reportStatus, reportStatus.updateTime AS updateTime
ORDER BY reportStatus.updateTime ASC
LIMIT 1
Rewrite: What is the earliest date on which a task was marked as 'Completed' for milestone 'Milestone 5' in project 'P-500'?

Question: Determine the assignment and joined dates for employees working on 'High Risk' tasks that are part of a project led by 'Jane Austin'.
Cypher:
MATCH (leader:User)-[manages:MANAGES]->(project:Project)-[includes:INCLUDES_TASK]->(task:Task)-[assignedTo:ASSIGNED_TO]->(employee:User)-[memberOf:MEMBER_OF]->(team:Team)
WHERE leader.firstName="Jane" AND leader.lastName="Austin" AND task.priority="High Risk"
RETURN leader, manages, project, includes, task, assignedTo, employee, memberOf, team, assignedTo.assignedDate, memberOf.joinedDate
Rewrite: Identify the assignment details and the dates of joining for employees engaged in 'High Risk' tasks within a project overseen by 'Jane Austin'.

Question: How many tasks, with priority 'High', are there on projects managed by users who belong to the 'Executive' team?
Rewrite: How many 'High' priority tasks exist on projects overseen by members of the 'Executive' team?

Question: What is the average estimated hours of tasks that depend on tasks assigned to users who joined the team before '2020-01-01'?
Cypher:
MATCH (dependentTask:Task)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(task:Task)-[assigned:ASSIGNED_TO]->(user:User)-[memberOf:MEMBER_OF]->(team:Team)
WHERE memberOf.joinedDate < date('2020-01-01')
RETURN AVG(dependentTask.estimatedHours)
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (dependentTask:Task)-[relation4:DEPENDS_ON]->(task:Task)-[assigned:ASSIGNED_TO]->(user:User)-[memberOf:MEMBER_OF]->(team:Team)
WHERE memberOf.joinedDate < date('2020-01-01')
RETURN AVG(dependentTask.estimatedHours)
Rewrite: What is the mean estimated duration of tasks reliant on tasks given to users added to the team prior to '2020-01-01'?

Question: Count the number of unique projects worked on by the members of the team 'QuickSolution' where they contributed to tasks of 'Low' priority.
Rewrite: Calculate how many distinct projects the 'QuickSolution' team members have worked on, specifically where they tackled 'Low' priority tasks.

Question: What is the maximum number of tasks any user has been assigned in projects having at least ten milestones?
Cypher:
MATCH (project:Project)-[:INCLUDES_MILESTONE]->(milestone:Milestone)
WITH project, COUNT(milestone) AS milestonesCount
WHERE milestonesCount >= 10
MATCH (project)<-[:INCLUDES_TASK]-(task:Task)-[:ASSIGNED_TO]->(user:User)
RETURN user.userId, COUNT(task) AS tasksCount
ORDER BY tasksCount DESC
LIMIT 1
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (project:Project)-[relation4:INCLUDES_MILESTONE]->(milestone:Milestone)
WITH project, COUNT(milestone) AS milestonesCount
WHERE milestonesCount >= 10
MATCH (project)-[relation5:INCLUDES_TASK]-(task:Task)-[relation6:ASSIGNED_TO]->(user:User)
RETURN user.userId, COUNT(task) AS tasksCount
ORDER BY tasksCount DESC
LIMIT 1
Rewrite: What is the highest number of tasks assigned to a single user in projects that have at least ten milestones?

Question: Determine the minimum and maximum actual hours spent by users on tasks that were part of the milestones completed within the last quarter.
Cypher:
MATCH (milestone:Milestone)-[milestoneFor:MILESTONE_FOR]->(task:Task)-[assigned:ASSIGNED_TO]->(user:User)
WHERE milestone.deadline >= date.truncate('quarter', date()) - duration({months: 3}) AND milestone.deadline < date.truncate('quarter', date())
RETURN MIN(task.actualHours) AS MinActualHours, MAX(task.actualHours) AS MaxActualHours
Rewrite: Identify the lowest and highest actual hours users dedicated to tasks associated with milestones finished in the previous quarter.

Question: Calculate the sum of due dates for tasks associated with the projects that each team in '2023 Business Expansion' is working on.
Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team)-[worksOn:TEAM_WORKS_ON]->(project:Project)-[includesTask:INCLUDES_TASK]->(task:Task)
WHERE project.name="2023 Business Expansion"
RETURN team.name AS TeamName, SUM(task.dueDate) AS SumDueDates
Rewrite: Compute the total of due dates for tasks linked to the projects being handled by every team in '2023 Business Expansion'.
